string.body: Lifton;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ab1_1231_TreasureGate_Da
string.body: Eraugea;An overseer guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_SZ_All] in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_2
string.body: Guruminerk;A Grave Robber at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. His fur is exceptionally smooth and glossy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_3
string.body: Paominerk;A Grave Robber at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is the overseer, but he mistreats his Human workers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_4
string.body: Chaurinrinerk;A Grave Robber at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. She hates dust and loves beautiful clothes and jewelry.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_5
string.body: Lianminerk;A Grave Robber at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is a skilled appraiser.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_6
string.body: Kuomonerk;A general goods merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He dislikes Meniherk.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_7
string.body: Gojirunerk;A food merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. A typical Shugo whose only concern is money.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF2a_8
string.body: Tiesansanerk;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. She is not remarkable except for the fact that she is the first Shugo warehouse manager.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phaon
string.body: Phaon;A Soul Healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is tired of working with Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thesaly
string.body: Thesaly;A teleporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is an aspiring author.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pollux
string.body: Pollux;A Manastone remover at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He has devoted his life to Manastones.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ankises
string.body: Ankises;A Daeva of Flame at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He studies the effects of Fregion's flames on the land.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Gaix
string.body: Gaix;A Guardian Centurion in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A_Town] in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Talos
string.body: Talos;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is said to be a fugitive criminal.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Polydorus
string.body: Polydorus;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He is a slacker.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hecuba
string.body: Hecuba;A worker at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. She wishes there were some handsome men around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2a_Shugo_pet1
string.body: Trader's Bodyguard;A Troll bodyguard at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LF2a_Hippolizard_Pet1
string.body: Tamed Tipolid;A transport Tipolid at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Crios
string.body: Crios;A bounty hunter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_Start] in Theobomos. He used to be a Daeva of Zephyr, but went freelance because it paid more.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Agrint_Tartagan
string.body: Tartagan;A burning Agrint in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2A_SZ_03]. His constant pain has driven him a little mad.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Blume
string.body: Blume;A general goods merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. He is a good person by nature.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jarnsaxa
string.body: Jarnsaxa;A food merchant at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She is a master of stews--a stewmaster, if you will.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dunkel
string.body: Dunkel;A warehouse manager at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. He has an incredible appetite and can even eat bugs if they are good for his health.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vehova
string.body: Vehova;A Soul Healer at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She has a lot of compassion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tusen
string.body: Tusen;A teleporter at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. He is a plain fellow and devoted to his duty.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Klokka
string.body: Klokka;A Manastone remover at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She hates it when people disturb her concentration.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vitda
string.body: Vitda;An Archon of the Wisdom Orb Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She's a scholar, not a fighter.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tala
string.body: Tala;An Archon of the Wisdom Orb Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She has some rather off-putting habits.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Randet
string.body: Randet;An Archon of the Wisdom Orb Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She is diligent and very responsible.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Noe
string.body: Noe;An Archon of the Wisdom Orb Legion dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2A_SZ_A] in Brusthonin. She admires Randet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vinduer

string.body: Lampard;A street musician in the Concert Hall. He is a gifted musician who can make beautiful melodies without effort. Strangely, he doesn't know how talented he really is.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Etonia
string.body: Etonia;A Daeva of Song in the Concert Hall. She likes to sing, but she doesn't sing well. She is a wretched person who always kills the mood. She is close friends with a high priest, and a secret about her will be revealed with the quest given by Dianara.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Federico
string.body: Ellon;A Daeva of Song at the Concert Hall. A singer with a horrible face but a beautiful voice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Margela
string.body: Margela;An upscale costume salesperson in the high class Costume Boutique. She is a materialistic gold digger who dresses the part, and her extravagant lifestyle always leaves her in debt.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Armano
string.body: Rudran;An upscale costume salesperson in the high class Costume Boutique. Everyone knows she is Daskin's favorite, which is why the rumors of an affair have passed around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Karindoni
string.body: Enira;An upscale costume salesperson in the high class Costume Boutique. She is the Daeva of Vanity's close friend and rival, and she helps customers according to how well-dressed they are.

string.body: Eremitia;A High Priest of Mirage serving Empyrean Lord Kaisinel. She remains in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC2] of Sanctum until Empyrean Lord Kaisinel returns.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Angulof
string.body: Angulof;A priest at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garvan
string.body: Garvan;A Preceptor of Gladiators and Templars in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium. He advocates leniency in his teachings and disagrees with Traufnir's strict principles.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hoogerwerf
string.body: Hongerverth;A Preceptor of Rangers and Assassins at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium. Because he lost his son in battle, he repeatedly warns his students not to be too careless.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ehate
string.body: Heszti;A Preceptor of Sorcerers and Spiritmasters at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium. She was once Vellun's teacher as well as the chair of the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center. Now retired, she devotes her free time to fostering the younger generation.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aranolf
string.body: Margel;A Preceptor of Clerics and Chanters at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium. Although quite accomplished, he is not very popular because of his hysterical nature.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hodorski
string.body: Hodorski;A Consumable Item Distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Deltandra
string.body: Deltandra;An accessory distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Schultz
string.body: Psyros;A high-grade weapons distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eldsul
string.body: Eldsul;A high-grade armor distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rodrigo
string.body: Rodrigo;A combat Stigma Distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Imever
string.body: Imever;A magic Stigma Distributor at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Marvin
string.body: Vilnus;A soldier guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Unsul
string.body: Bredren;A soldier guarding the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fjoersvith
string.body: Fjoersvith;A great scholar at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] in Pandaemonium. Her vast knowledge of subjects is almost as impressive as her personality issues. Nothing interests her but the pursuit of knowledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Agehia
string.body: Agehia;A Priest of Destiny serving Empyrean Lord Marchutan. She remains in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2] of Pandaemonium to fill in for the absent Empyrean Lord Marchutan. She always lives up to her word.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Matias
string.body: Matias;A Soul Healer in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ord_Teleporter_L1
string.body: Air Line;A transport device fueled by Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Forlan
string.body: Forlan;A teleporter of Balaurea in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Drenia
string.body: Drenia;A weapons Quartermaster in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Weapons are her thing, and she came to Balaurea to discover new ones.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Andrea
string.body: Drey;An armor Quartermaster in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was transferred to Balaurea against his will.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Giovani
string.body: Jondas;An ordnance Quartermaster stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is very unmotivated and still thinks that he was sent to Balaurea by mistake.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lionel
string.body: Lionel;A medicine Quartermaster stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He volunteered for his position in Balaurea to make a name for himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Borriello
string.body: Borriello;A food supply soldier in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Very matter of fact, he's as capable of using his knives to cut a fine steak or an attacking Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ricius
string.body: Ricius;A shield Quartermaster working in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Daniele
string.body: Reemul;A Stigma master in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. The prized student of an Elyos Stigma master, he traveled alone to Balaurea to surpass his teacher.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Caicedo
string.body: Caicedo;A manastone remover in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. A fanatic collector of manastones, he came to Balaurea in pursuit of new and undocumented manastones.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Artem
string.body: Artem;A warehouse manager in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He believes that the best way of living is to go with the flow as one's destiny decides.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4_1
string.body: Nellinerk;A trade broker in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4_2
string.body: Hodirunerk;A trade broker in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Eduardo
string.body: Eduardo;A warrior class distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is creepy enough to make you want to take a shower when you leave him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Giuseppe
string.body: Seppi;A scout class administration officer in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Eduardo has a deep interest in this promising novice administration officer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Silva
string.body: Silva;A mage class administration officer in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Although blessed with an athletic physique, he does not like fighting.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amauri
string.body: Amauri;A priest class distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pilipides
string.body: Pilipides;A weapons distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He likes fighting and aspires to be a hero, but he lacks determination.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Marcia
string.body: Jandar;An armor distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She became a distributor through her parents' influence and wealth, but is ignorant of the rest of the world.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Apelles
string.body: Apelles;A Consumable Item Distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Campaspe
string.body: Campaspe;A fashion-loving ditz who's also an accessory distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Calito
string.body: Sinsoon;A high-grade weapons distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is always too proud of his accomplishments.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valens
string.body: Valens;A high-grade armor distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Popaea
string.body: Popaea;A combat Stigma Distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress, she is more practical than her cuteness suggests.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Paulina
string.body: Paulina;A magic Stigma Distributor in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cainus
string.body: Outremus;Elyos Leader in Inggison and Agent of Kaisinel. His prettiness has made him tough and enterprising.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Versetti
string.body: Versetti;Brigade General and Commander of the Wisplight Legion at Inggison Illusion Fortress. He uses both magic and weapons, and encourages free-thinking in his reports.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yulia
string.body: Yulia;Brigade General of the Hushblade Legion stationed at Inngison Illusion Fortress. A no-nonsense leader, she hates the outmoded and, she feels, patronizing Brig. Gen. Versetti.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gellius
string.body: Gellius;A Wisplight centurion stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He knows a lot about Spirit magic and uses it like an expert. As a student in the Temple, he was rivals with Telemachus.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Plinius
string.body: Plinius;A Wisplight centurion in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. A bit of a nincompoop, he tends to give utterly meaningless orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pucio
string.body: Pucio;A centurion of the Hushblade Legion in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He ascended as a Daeva at an early age and was considered a genius because of his unusual talents.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Secundila
string.body: Secundila;A centurion of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phailos
string.body: Phailos;An alchemist belonging to the Wisplight and stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was attracted to alchemy all his life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aiola
string.body: Teressa;A Wisplight legionary in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She dreams of becoming the best Spiritmaster EVER.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Agelastos
string.body: Agelastos;A Hushblade legionary in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is an excellent sniper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phryne
string.body: Phryne;A Hushblade legionary in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She gets restless if she hasn't killed something in a while.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Seneca
string.body: Seneca;A legionary in the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Part Asmodian by birth, he's fiercely Elyos by nature, but his expectation of being teased and reviled has left him prickly. Delus is his only friend.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aglaus
string.body: Caceus;A Cleric belonging to the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He came to Balaurea to treat the wounded on the front lines.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Opilius
string.body: Opilius;A Daeva of Life in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is as arrogant as he is powerful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Clodia
string.body: Clodia;A Daeva of Life in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She is known to be friendly with Sirink, but no one knows just how friendly.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pilomenes
string.body: Pilomenes;A Balaur researcher from the outskirts of Elysea. He doesn't much notice the Balaur themselves, he's so wrapped up in academics.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Strabon
string.body: Harknes;A scholar in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was dispatched to do research on the ecosystem of Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nonnos
string.body: Nonnos;A researcher of ancient history in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. His theories are so unorthodox that he is called a maverick.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hyacintus
string.body: Cintus;An enthusiastic ancient history researcher in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He idolizes Nonnos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Meiria
string.body: Meiria;The only messenger from Sanctum in Inggison. She brings mail and news, or convinces others to do it for her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kailaus
string.body: Kailaus;A militant priest of the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She was dispatched to Balaurea to establish a truce with the Reian tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zenobia
string.body: Zenobia;One of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Following Lephar's secret order, she infiltrated [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP] without notice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4_3
string.body: Oconerk;A shugo treasure hunter in Soteria Sanctuary in Inggison. He travels around the world with his wife, Everinrinerk, in search of treasure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Veloso
string.body: Veloso;A scholar at the Investigator's Campsite in the Calmheart Grove, Inggison. He is investigating the natural environment of Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ambrosini
string.body: Ambred;A scholar at the Investigator's Campsite in the Calmheart Grove in Inggison. He wants to finish the investigation and go back to Elysea as soon as possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Crosia
string.body: Crosia;A Wisplight legionary stationed at the Taloc Research Campsite in Taloc's Forest, Inggison. She was dispatched to watch over the Daevas of Life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adias
string.body: Adias;A Daeva of Life at the Taloc Research Campsite in the Taloc's Forest, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dorsia
string.body: Tialla;A Daeva of Life at the Taloc Research Campsite in the Taloc's Forest, Inggison. She is searching for new methods of using Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Marica
string.body: Marica;A Wisplight legionary in the Obelisk Installation Base in the Dimaia Fountainhead in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Armond
string.body: Armond;A Hushblade legionary at the Obelisk Installation Base in the Dimaia Fountainhead in Inggison. He is highly motivated by everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Stelvia
string.body: Stelvia;A Hushblade legionary in the Obelisk Installation Base in the Dimaia Fountainhead in Inggison. She is ambitious and cunning.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Heranas
string.body: Veille;A Kaisinel's Agent guarding the Inggison Outpost. Although she looks like a regular girl, she actually has tremendous power.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Doria
string.body: Doria;A scholar at Doria's Campsite in the Wildheart Grove in Inggison. She would try every possible means in order to satisfy her curiosity.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Delus
string.body: Delus;A soldier belonging to the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed at Doria's Campsite in the Wildheart Grove in Inggison. He seems to be having troubles because of Doria.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dolabella
string.body: Dolabella;A Soul Healer in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ord_Teleporter_L2
string.body: Air Line;A transport device fueled by Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cinisca
string.body: Cinisca;An ordnance Quartermaster stationed in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He laments that he's been working as a simple Quartermaster for ages because nobody recognizes his combat skills.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fabius
string.body: Fabius;A food Quartermaster in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He dislikes his own name very much but would never admit it out loud.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Levilus
string.body: Levilus;A warehouse manager in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He never lets dust collect on the inventory.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asprenas
string.body: Asprenas;A warrior class administration officer in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Valeria
string.body: Baleria;A Soul Healer at the Edge of Torment in Brusthonin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Antiochos
string.body: Anteoch;A mage class administration officer in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laodice
string.body: Laodice;A priest class administration officer in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He never makes a decision until analyzing every possible outcome.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Pomponia
string.body: Pomponia;A Hushblade legionary in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. Something of a sadist, she always switches back to being overly nice when she realizes that's leaking through.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cicero
string.body: Cicero;A Hushblade legionary in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. Always worried about something, he now believes the ground is not firm enough under the current army post.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Atalos
string.body: Atalos;A legionary of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force in the Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maisa
string.body: Maisa;A legionary of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. She feels a deep sense of regret for the many creatures devastated by Tiamat's attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thrax
string.body: Thrax;A Daeva of Life in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He is always relaxed, casual and composed.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sulla
string.body: Sulla;A scholar in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison, with a heavy interest in the origin and history of the Reian tribe of the Temple Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Geta
string.body: Geta;A researcher of ancient history in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He came with Nonnos to the village. He seems to be dissatisfied with Nonnos although he continues to follow his orders.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tonis
string.body: Tonis;A Daeva in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He says he is researching Balaurea, but no one knows his real purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Savinus
string.body: Savinus;A Reian tribe survivor in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He is a little wary of the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gelon
string.body: Gelon;A Reian tribe survivor living in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He is an older Reian tribesman who is very familiar with the history and lore of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4_4
string.body: Everinrinerk;A treasure hunter in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. Her husband, Oconerk, is also a treasure hunter, but they live apart to better search for fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Philon
string.body: Philon;A scholar at the Philon's Campsite in the Scar Canyon, Inggison. He has been studying Tiamat's power, which has petrified the nearby area.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aglais
string.body: Marlee;A scholar. NOT IN USE

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Croton
string.body: Vrius;A Wisplight Legionary stationed at Philon's Campsite in Inggison. He claims to be suffering from acute Balaur allergies.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4_5
string.body: Meininerk;A Shugo in Weeping Valley, Inggison. He has come to mine minerals.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LF4_1
string.body: Seikin;A Shulack refugee at the Two-handed Rock in the Wretched Garden, Inggison. There is nothing he cares more about than his younger sister, Setzkiki.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LF4_2
string.body: Setzkiki;A Shulack refugee at the Two-handed Rock in the Wretched Garden, Inggison. She is the younger sister of Seikin.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Physon
string.body: Physon;A Reian tribesman captured by the Dragonbound of Undirborg, Inggison. He is about to be converted into a Dragonbound against his will.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Adicia
string.body: Adicia;A Soul Healer in the Undirborg Observation Post of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Corocota
string.body: Corocota;A legionary of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force stationed at the Undirborg Observation Post in Inggison. He is no ordinary legionary but no one knows why.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Titus
string.body: Titus;A Reian tribe survivor in the Undirborg Observation Post of Inggison. He lost his family to the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barus
string.body: Barus;A legionary of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force in the Inggison Undirborg. He is kind, friendly and very popular around the city.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rivilla
string.body: Rivilla;A Soul Healer at the Inggison Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enoitia
string.body: Enoitia;A fortress Quartermaster in the Inggison Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Darecia
string.body: Darecia;A legion warehouse manager at the Inggison Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Accius
string.body: Rucal;A warehouse manager in the Inggison Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Iaetia
string.body: Iaetia;A centurion of the Hushblade Legion stationed in the Inggison Outpost. She assists Outremus and commands the legion in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rollia
string.body: Rollia;A legionary of the Wisplight in the Inggison Outpost. She is quite ambitious and wants to win the battle as soon as possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sarapion
string.body: Sarapion;A Hushblade legionary in Inggison Outpost. He takes much pride in his fighting abilities during battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Harmonia
string.body: Auralia;A Hushblade legionary in Inggison Outpost. She is always pessimistic and dislikes most things in life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gorgias
string.body: Gorgias;A Soul Healer who is dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ardusia
string.body: Ardusia;A fortress Quartermaster who is dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Issonie
string.body: Issonie;A legion warehouse manager who is dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Snaios
string.body: Palorc;A warehouse manager who is dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison is occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Keios
string.body: Keios;A Hushblade legionary who is dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison falls into enemy hands.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ingnie
string.body: Ingnie;A Hushblade legionary who is dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Crasus
string.body: Crasus;A Soul Healer in the Angrief Observation Post of Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elios
string.body: Katia;A Hushblade legionary who appears in the Angrief Observation Post of Inggison when the Altar of Avarice falls into enemy hands.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Totus
string.body: Totus;A Sanctum Expeditionary Force legionary stationed in the Angrief Observation Post of Inggison. He seems to dislike the Hushblade Legion for reasons known only to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Biahios
string.body: Biahios;A legionary of the Sanctum Expeditionary Force in the Angrief Observation Post of Inggison. He carries out his duties faithfully but shows no interest in anything else.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Wivius
string.body: Wivius;A Dramata chaser at the Collapsed Gate in Inggison. He used to be a talented sniper for the Hushblade Legion, but he left because of personality issues. He is now chasing the elusive Dramata.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_delphia
string.body: Delphia;A Soul Healer who is dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Chronics
string.body: Zurd;A fortress Quartermaster who is dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Phoulion
string.body: Phoulion;A legion warehouse manager to be dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison is occupied by the enemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Verulie
string.body: Verulie;A warehouse manager who is dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison is occupied.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Queesia
string.body: Siaqua;A Wisplight Legionary dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison comes under Elyos control. She distrusts the Sanctum Expeditionary Force.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Chekius
string.body: Chekius;A Sanctum Expeditionary Force legionary who is dispatched when the Temple of Scales in Inggison is occupied. He is tactless and wild in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sulinia
string.body: Sulinia;A Balaur researcher in the Hanarkand Plains, Inggison. She has been ordered to study the culture and civilization of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Moras
string.body: Moras;A Wisplight legionary who appears when the Temple of Scales is under attack. He'll usually ask for help when he needs to, but don't hold him to it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yereos
string.body: Yereos;A researcher of ancient history in Hanarkand Plains, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Donikia
string.body: Donikia;A Reian tribeswoman captured in Hanarkand, Inggison. She holds the answers to the secrets of Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Wonded_Deva_01
string.body: Wounded Daeva;A Daeva wounded in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Elim_DF4_01
string.body: Lothas;A young Elim hidden inside a cave in Taloc's Forest, Inggison. It appears to have been born from Taloc's long branch.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Thalia
string.body: Thalia;A Sanctum Expedition Centurion who is dispatched to the Temple of Scales in Inggison when it is under the control of the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kerus
string.body: Kerus;A Sanctum Expeditionary Force centurion dispatched when the Altar of Avarice in Inggison comes under Elyos control. He is so preoccupied with military tactics that he wrote a book on the subject.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laokoon
string.body: Laokon;An Air Line maintenance soldier in the Inggison Illusion Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lausus
string.body: Lausus;An Air Line maintenance soldier in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_castalia
string.body: Castalia;A warehouse manager in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. She was once famous for being a gifted genius in Verteron, but her fame didn't seem to equate to success.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_brontes
string.body: Brontes;A quartermaster in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He is the most experienced of the quartermasters.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nikola
string.body: Gallia;A Soul Healer in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ord_Teleporter_D1
string.body: Air Line;A transport device fueled by Aether in Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sepsi
string.body: Ipses;A weapons Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She is a merchant at heart and actually searches the corpses of fallen soldiers for anything valuable.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Boleyn
string.body: Rayera;An armor Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vincenzo
string.body: Cenvezo;An ordnance Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gennaro
string.body: Gennaro;A medicine Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He can cure or treat almost any malady or illness.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Amrabat
string.body: Amrabat;A food Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He seems to be unfamiliar with Balaur spices and his salty meals illustrate this.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Collett
string.body: Collett;A shield Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She is fascinated by the appearance of the shields she sells.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Garath
string.body: Garath;A Stigma master of the Gelkmaros Fortress. He came to Balaurea after being persuaded by his teacher, but he now regrets this decision.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mexes
string.body: Greger;A manastone remover in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Balotelli
string.body: Balotelli;A warehouse manager in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4_1
string.body: Toorunerk;A trade broker in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4_2
string.body: Scullinerk;A trade broker in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nordin
string.body: Nordin;A warrior class administration officer in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He has an unhealthy interest in Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Flores
string.body: Flores;A scout class administration officer in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She was born wealthy and loves colorful flowers.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Godin
string.body: Godin;A mage class administration officer in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is a maverick and prefers to fight alone.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Assulin
string.body: Avanna;A priest class administration officer in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She was so tired of treating injured soldiers that she quit the legion and became an administration officer.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Renato
string.body: Renato;A weapons distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aslaug
string.body: Jelan;An armor distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Maxi
string.body: Mempar;A Consumable Item Distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Janoka
string.body: Janoka;An accessory distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Beldeg
string.body: Beldeg;A high-grade weapons distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gaut
string.body: Gaut;A high-grade armor distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Birgitta
string.body: Kjaeros;A combat administration officer in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Camila
string.body: Camila;A magic Stigma Distributor in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hler
string.body: Richelle;A Marchutan's Agent who carries out the orders of Empyrean Lord Marchutan. She is also the commander of the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barretta
string.body: Valetta;The Brigade General of the Fatebound Legion stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She ascended at an early age and is so talented that she has become the youngest Brigade General in their history.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gelastra
string.body: Gelastra;A Fatebound centurion stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She was so impressed by Brigade General Valetta that she has decided to work for her.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hnikar
string.body: Hnikar;A Fatebound centurion stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is very faithful and quite trustworthy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brynhild
string.body: Brynhild;A centurion of the Pandaemonium Central Army stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She has always been the second in command under her friend Valetta. She both loves and hates Valetta and wants to one day take her position.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Andvari
string.body: Andvari;A Fatebound legionary in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is quite short and suffers from an inferiority complex.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Niamela
string.body: Niamela;A Fatebound legionary stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She had always wanted to be a priest, but a high-ranking official forced her to enroll with the legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Jalg
string.body: Jalg;A Fatebound legionary stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. This young Daeva, who just recently ascended, has not experienced many battles.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fili
string.body: Atrum;A Fatebound legionary in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nep
string.body: Nep;A member of the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He gives his whole heart into whatever he believes in.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gunloeth
string.body: Gunloeth;A legionary belonging to the Pandaemonium Central Army stationed in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is a man of few words.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Olibares
string.body: Moynai;A researcher with the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center working in the Gelkmaros Fortress. Overworked and underpaid.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Riati
string.body: Riati;A researcher with the 9th Pandaemonium Research Center working in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arwen
string.body: Mialan;A messenger sent from Pandaemonium to Gelkmaros Fortress to deliver news about Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Wolfgang
string.body: Vellun;The chairman of the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center dispatched to the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is obstinate and bull-headed. But as a scholar, he has enjoys his studies more than anything else.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Schiemann
string.body: Wistron;A scholar in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He came to Balaurea to do research on Drana.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Schutz
string.body: Dhivork;A Daeva of Literature in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He aspires to write a novel about the history of the Reian tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ightris
string.body: Ightris;An ecologist in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She came to study the plants of Balaurea, but she makes others do the hard work because she doesn't like walking around.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Athis
string.body: Athis;A researcher of ancient history in the Gelkmaros Fortress. His interests are mainly in the Reian tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Unset
string.body: Greeta;A priest in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She is unfriendly and no one likes her morbid sermons.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vyuin
string.body: Vyuin;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force legionary stationed in the Antagor Guard Post. He is convinced he's cursed with bad luck.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Danomdel
string.body: Danomdel;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force legionary stationed in the Antagor Guard Post. He is a veteran of many hard battles in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Angrad
string.body: Angrad;A Fatebound legionary at the Aether Research Group Campsite in the Antagor Canyon in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Vesvola
string.body: Vesvola;A Fatebound legionary at the Aether Research Group Campsite in the Antagor Canyon in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Irkale
string.body: Irkale;A Daeva belonging to the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center, who is now at the Aether Research Group Campsite in the Antagor Canyon in Gelkmaros. She is trying to access the information and knowledge of the Reian tribe through Eddas.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aesir
string.body: Eddas;A Reian tribe elder at the Aether Research Group Campsite in the Antagor Canyon in Gelkmaros. He has lived for ages and accumulated unfathomable experience.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Barcine
string.body: Barcine;A Reian tribe survivor. NOT IN USE

string.name: STR_DIC_N_feles
string.body: Feles;A scholar at the Strigik Research Group Campsite in Gelkmaros. This is her first field assignment.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Varca
string.body: Varca;The captain of the Advance Party that came to cultivate the Strigik Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Asathor
string.body: Asathor;A Fatebound legionary in the Strigik Research Group Campsite.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Kantele
string.body: Kantele;A Fatebound legionary captured by Strigik. She is Asathor's close friend but is confined somewhere deep inside Strigik Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Carabel
string.body: Carabel;A Daeva of Minerals found near the Collapsed Building in the Sunken Canyon. Although she was ordered to collect rare minerals for study, she seems to find more interest in making a profit by selling them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nalther
string.body: Nalther;A Fatebound legionary. NOT IN USE

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Denskel
string.body: Denskel;A Fatebound legionary at the Krug Waterfall in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Innola
string.body: Innola;A Soul Healer in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ord_Teleporter_D2
string.body: Air Line;A transport device fueled by Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4_1
string.body: Tetzkin;A general goods merchant in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4_2
string.body: Sayakiki;A food merchant in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4_5
string.body: Taamiki;A warehouse manager in the Rhonnam Refugee Village in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Oski
string.body: Oski;A warrior class administration officer in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Voer
string.body: Unreath;A scout class administration officer in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Althjof
string.body: Merlean;A Fatebound Centurion dispatched to Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dori
string.body: Dancen;A priest class administration officer in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Nysdvor
string.body: Nysdvor;A Fatebound legionary stationed in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. He finds pleasure in the smallest things.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_morhua
string.body: Morhua;A Fatebound legionary stationed in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. She helps take care of Sapien refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Skira
string.body: Skira;A researcher with the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center now staying in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. She came to the village to do research on Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gehlen
string.body: Gehlen;A Darkseeker legionary stationed in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. He seems to be in charge of keeping an eye on Rhonnam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brauni_DF4_01
string.body: Titimi;A Kobold refugee in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brauni_DF4_02
string.body: Bibiti;A refugee Kobold in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ratman_DF4_01
string.body: Bibi Lu;A refugee Skurv in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ratman_DF4_02
string.body: Bibi Kal;A refugee Skurv in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4_4
string.body: Chenkiki;A Shulack refugee in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. She respects Rhonnam and wants to help him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yolyer
string.body: Yolyer;A Daeva of Exploration in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. He says he came to explore Balaurea, but no one knows his real purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aurbotha
string.body: Aurbotha;A Reian tribe survivor in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. Only staying in the village temporarily, he wanders about with Sirob.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Beli
string.body: Sirob;A Reian tribe survivor in Rhonnam Refugee Village, Gelkmaros. Only staying in the village temporarily, he wanders about with Aurbotha.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DF4_3
string.body: Purkin;A Shulack refugee found on the Spiritfall Crossroads in Gelkmaros. He's obsessed with his cart, which he's named Mitta.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brauni_DF4_03
string.body: Domati;A refugee Kobold on the Spiritfall Crossroads in Gelkmaros. He's sick of Purkin's obsession with his cart.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Martinez
string.body: Farbin;A researcher with the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center. He performs his research in the Farbin Campsite of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_reptilia
string.body: Jecasti;A Fatebound legionary at the Farbin's Campsite in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Healre
string.body: Lynari;A Soul Healer in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Inauke
string.body: Norrin;A fortress Quartermaster in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dinke
string.body: Evadene;A legion warehouse manager found in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Zableta
string.body: Zableta;A warehouse manager in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Biahof
string.body: Biahof;A Fatebound legionary in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Mamalia
string.body: Phina;A Fatebound legionary in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ricaldo
string.body: Ricaldo;A legionary belonging to the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force stationed in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aquila
string.body: Aquila;A legionary belonging to the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force stationed in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Belik
string.body: Belik;A Reian tribe survivor in the Gelkmaros Defense Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Stephano
string.body: Stephano;A Reian tribe survivor in the Subterranea Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ciran
string.body: Ciran;A Soul Healer in the Subterranea Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ortiz
string.body: Ortiz;A Reian tribe survivor in the Subterranea Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_hildisvini
string.body: Hildisvini;A Reian tribe survivor in the Subterranea Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fjoelnir
string.body: Fjoelnir;A soldier with the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force stationed in the Subterranea Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Geeze
string.body: Vegrim;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force soldier stationed in the Drana Farm Observation Post of Gelkmaros. He likes to come up with strange ideas, and they usually work.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Grauzer
string.body: Grauzer;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force soldier stationed in the Drana Farm Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lucal
string.body: Lucal;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force soldier stationed in the Drana Farm Observation Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bafur
string.body: Bafur;A Soul Healer who is dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Isseim
string.body: Isseim;A fortress Quartermaster who is dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Inthedra
string.body: Inthedra;A legion warehouse manager who is dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Moritz
string.body: Moritz;A warehouse manager who is dispatched when the Asmodians occupy the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Krizarid
string.body: Krizarid;A Fatebound legionary who is dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros. They say the Tower of Eternity exploded because it knew it could never be as awesome as him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Esendia
string.body: Esendia;A Fatebound legionary who is dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros. She's the cool, calm balance to Krizarid's hot temper.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Boemboer
string.body: Boemboer;A Soul Healer in the Vorgaltem Scout Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ankea
string.body: Ankea;A Fatebound legionary in the Vorgaltem Scout Post of Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arango
string.body: Arango;A member of the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force stationed in the Vorgaltem Scout Post of Gelkmaros. He is anything but flexible in his beliefs.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ormele
string.body: Ormele;A Soul Healer to be dispatched only when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tamuz
string.body: Tamuz;A fortress Quartermaster to be dispatched only when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Dekel
string.body: Dekel;A legion warehouse manager to be dispatched only when Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Arise
string.body: Risa;A warehouse manager who is dispatched only when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Svidar
string.body: Svidar;A soldier of the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force to be dispatched when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros. He is optimistic and loves to give compliments.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cozett
string.body: Cozett;A soldier of the Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force who is dispatched only when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros. She is an orphan and considers Svidar her father.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Itar
string.body: Itar;A scholar at the Expedition Campsite in Gelkmaros. He is very polite, unlike his older brother, Tanar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tanar
string.body: Tanar;A Balaur researcher at the Expedition Campsite in Gelkmaros. Although usually whimsical, he dotes on his younger brother, Itar.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Batalrion
string.body: Batalrion;A Dramata chaser in the Batalrion Campsite in Gelkmaros. He is actually the leader of the Dramata chasers and is very resourceful.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Olga
string.body: Olga;A Dramata chaser in the Batalrion Campsite in Gelkmaros. She is a little...strange in her ways of thinking.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Helen
string.body: Helline;A Dramata chaser in the Batalrion Campsite in Gelkmaros. Once a promising sorcerer, she chose the career of a Dramata chaser for the excitement and adventure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Yumir
string.body: Yumir;A spiritmaster in the Gelkmaros Fortress. He has not made much of a name for himself yet but he still wants to prove that he is a good Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Herka
string.body: Herka;A Balaur researcher in the Gelkmaros Fortress. She volunteered to work in the fortress because she loved the notion of studying real Balaur in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Tegrak
string.body: Mastarius;A Marchutan's Agent guarding the Gelkmaros Defense Base. He regards Marchutan's will as absolute truth and does not forgive those who disobey it.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Poisoned_Deva_01
string.body: Poisoned Daeva;A Daeva under the influence of poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_CaspaGhost_02
string.body: Taloc's Guardian;An Elim's ectoplasm lingering on the path to the Krug Basin. It was drawn to Gelkmaros by the power of the Aether Generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rhombus
string.body: Rhonnam;A Reian tribe survivor in the Rhonnam Refugee Village in Gelkmaros. He built the remaining Nunglark survivors a new village. As a result, he gained the eternal trust of the Sapiens.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Ranack
string.body: Ranack;A Pandaemonium Expeditionary Force centurion to be dispatched when the Asmodians attack the Vorgaltem Citadel in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Hrimfaxi
string.body: Hrimfaxi;A Pandaemonium Central Army centurion to be dispatched when the Asmodians occupy the Crimson Temple in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Notud
string.body: Notud;An Air Line maintenance soldier in the Gelkmaros Fortress. Rumor has it that the fumes from the Air Line made him shrink in size.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Raniwu
string.body: Raniwu;An Air Line maintenance soldier in the Rhonnam Refugee Village in Gelkmaros. Rumor has it that the fumes from the Air Line made him shrink in size.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Snyder
string.body: Kaladee;A warehouse manager in the Gelkmaros Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Agovard
string.body: Agovard;A quartermaster of the Gelkmaros Fortress. He is unusually righteous and a little rigid.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Engeius
string.body: Engeius;A member of the Reian Tribe of Protection. He is an excellent fighter and has mastered the art of shield-attacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Abyla
string.body: Abyla;A Healing Reian Tribesman. He has tremendous healing power.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Shulack_Elim_1
string.body: Dorkin;A Shulack who was expelled from his village for some reason. He is hiding somewhere inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_CaspaGhost_01
string.body: Taloc's Mirage;A mirage conjured by Taloc's Soul that appears when [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DElim_3F_KomadeNM_53_Ae] is defeated.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Honeus
string.body: Honeus;An elder of the Reian tribe found in the Undirborg Observation Post of Inggison. He agrees with the idea of forming an alliance with the Elyos.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sueros
string.body: Sueros;A Guardian Centurion in the Undirborg Observation Post of Inggison. He has a strong sense of responsibility but does not deal well with pressure.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Steurios
string.body: Steurios;An army surgeon in the Undirborg Observation Post of Inggison. He loves to talk, and if no one is around you will find him talking to himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Gefeios
string.body: Gefeios;A Reian tribe blacksmith in Soteria Sanctuary, Inggison. He would do anything he could to make a good weapon. It is his life.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Aglauros
string.body: Aglauros;A Reian tribe elder in the Marayas Wilds of Gelkmaros. He despises the Balaur and the Dragonbound so much that he would side with the Asmodians in order to eliminate them.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Taustir
string.body: Taustir;An Archon Centurion found in the Marayas Wilds of Gelkmaros. He does what he is told and nothing more.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Sulbanyer
string.body: Sulbanyer;A Daeva of Herbs in the Marayas Wilds of Gelkmaros. As part of his work, he has been researching poisons and their antidotes.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Altinard
string.body: Altina;A Reian tribesman in the Marayas Wilds of Gelkmaros. Since she lost her daughter to the Dragonbound, vengeance has become her only reason to live.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_DF4_NPC_Nehmatan
string.body: Tataka;A Kobold blacksmith in the Rhonnam Refugee Village of Gelkmaros. His passion, though, is cooking, but he isn't that good at it yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Anilmo
string.body: Anilmo;A Reian tribesman cooperating with the Asmodians. He is smart and polite, and the older tribesmen enjoy his company.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Lequier
string.body: Lequier;A Soul Healer found in the Altar of Avarice, Inggison. He appears only when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Honore
string.body: Honore;A fortress Quartermaster found in the Altar of Avarice, Inggison. He appears only when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Bidet
string.body: Shaenna;A legion warehouse manager found in the Altar of Avarice, Inggison. He appears only when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Frosti
string.body: Danton;A warehouse manager found in the Altar of Avarice, Inggison. He appears only when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Fundin
string.body: Fundin;A Fatebound centurion who is dispatched when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice in Inggison. He is audacious and believes that only men can lead armies into battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Rocayd
string.body: Rocayd;A Fatebound legionary who is dispatched when the Asmodians occupy the Altar of Avarice in Inggison. Although he hasn't made a name for himself yet, he is very talented and promising.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Enaff
string.body: Doscan;A Soul Healer in the Temple of Scales in Inggison. He only appears when the Asmodians occupy the Temple of Scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Giovana
string.body: Giovana;A fortress Quartermaster in the Temple of Scales in Inggison. She only appears when the Asmodians occupy the Temple of Scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Cornua

string.body: Klaw Spawner;Located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2_SUB_2] in the western end of the Eracus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_NeutSpawner_Q1548
string.body: Klawspawn;Klaw eggs found in the Poya Jungle. If you are unlucky, you may encounter [%dic:STR_DIC_M_NeutL2NamedQ_39_An] when you touch the eggs.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Neutspawner_Q1053
string.body: Klawspawn;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_NeutL2NamedQ_39_An]'s eggs found in Klawtan's Wallow. If you are unlucky, you may encounter the Queen Klaw when you touch the eggs.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Underpass_LiStatue_Q30056

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Underpass_DaStatue_Q30156
string.body: Statue Sinigalla;A woman who was cursed into becoming a statue while she fought the Balaur in the Silentera Canyon You can release her from this curse by using the Medicine of Restoration on her.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10025B
string.body: Power Wardstone;A wardstone that protects the Aetheric Field Generator. It located in the Aetheric Field Room. Access to it is restricted as long as Ahbana the Wicked lives. Ahbana only appears after several [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDCatacombsN_Reric_Q30222]s in Beshmundir Temple's Vault of Conquerors are destroyed.

string.body: Aetheric Field Generator;A device that sustains the Aetheric Field surrounding the Balaur Bulwark. It's known to be hidden deep in the Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10023A
string.body: Western Petrified Mass;A mass petrified by Tiamat's power. It can be seen in Scar Canyon and may be a part of Theobomos's Project Drakanhammer.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10023B
string.body: Eastern Petrified Mass;A mass petrified by Tiamat's power. It can be seen in Scar Canyon and may be a part of Theobomos's Project Drakanhammer.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10023D
string.body: Drakan Stone Statue;You must take the Bloody Greathammer from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticAs_NamedQ_53_An] and insert it into the statue to access the Hidden Library.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_HugeDoor_Q21111
string.body: Big Gate;A gate in the Vorgaltem Battlefield.

string.body: Infected Fungie Remains;Remains of a potentially infected Fungie in the Marayas Scrubland.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Spore_Q21114
string.body: Fungie Patch; A patch of fertile soil good for growing Fungies.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FishingRod_Q21200
string.body: Lucal's Fishing Rod;A fishing rod that Lucal has left behind.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Basket_Q21200
string.body: Lidded Bucket;A bucket keeping the catch.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_DranaSuctionDevice_Q21202
string.body: Viscum Drana Growing Device;A device that accelerates the growth of Drana.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Box_Q21205
string.body: Balaur Supplies;The crates of supplies regularly distributed to the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Trash_Q21212
string.body: Bulwark Wreck;Remains of the Balaur bulwark found in the Vorgaltem Battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_RuinedDranaSuction_Q21214
string.body: Abandoned Drana Growing Device;A Drana Growing Device at Dragonrest. It was abandoned by the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FloatingStone_Q21216
string.body: Noble Magic Stone;A distinctive white magic stone you can find in the Dragonrest.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_RuinedGiant_Q21220
string.body: Petralith Remains;Unidentified rock pieces found in the Petralith Canyon. They are thought to be Petralith remains.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q21105
string.body: Suspicious Wreck;A pile of debris. Could be a good place for a Shulack to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36504
string.body: Pluma Bait;Bait placed in the Wildheart Grove. It is made of the grass loved by Lightningbeak Pabu.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36505
string.body: Spiritcaller Incense Burner;An incense burner in Taloc's Forest that can summon Celodus Twistrings' soul.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36510
string.body: Half-rotten Animal Carcass;Bait placed in the Wretched Garden to catch Twister.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36511
string.body: Researcher's Equipment;Equipment used as a trap to lure the ghost of Valkinas the Scholar from the Wretched Garden.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36516
string.body: Acid Canister;A canister of acid wrapped in a cloth bag placed near Angrief Ruins. Crimsonbark will actually be attracted to its contents.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q36517
string.body: Tricorn Food;The food that the Balaur of Hanarkand gave their tamed Tricorns. Sweetsteppe often appears near the food.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46504
string.body: Fresh Fruit;A trap to hunt Rokbak near the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46505
string.body: Soul Invocation Jar;A jar found in the Dragonspine Rise. With this jar, you can summon Vengeful Romludon's soul.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46510
string.body: Snuffler Thistle Trap;A trap for hunting Nimblestump near the Marayas Scrubland.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46511
string.body: Worn Spell Scroll;An old spell scroll discarded near the Nunglark Ruins. It is said that Sorceress Imilyana's ghost often appears in this vicinity.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46516
string.body: Sandy Carcass;A food that the Zanthays in the Dragonrest love. It was put there to capture Zantra.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q46517
string.body: Vine Seed;Seeds of a big plant found in the Petralith Canyon. It is a disguised form of Vinestem.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q45007
string.body: Beluslan Field Monitor;A crystal tower that the Field Wardens installed in Beluslan. It examines the state of the Aetheric Field.

string.body: Beluslan Aetheric Field Scanner;An Aetheric Field Scanner that the Field Wardens installed in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q45009
string.body: Entropic Fragment;Suspicious fragments found in the Beluslan region. Those who bear a grudge against Asmodians seem to have installed them with sinister intentions.

string.body: Brusthonin Field Monitor;A crystal tower that the Field Wardens installed in Brusthonin. It examines the state of the Aetheric Field.

string.body: Chasing Eye;A strange device that the Alabaster Order set up in Heiron to detect enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q35023
string.body: Janusite Meteorite;A suspicious ore discovered in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LC1_LC2_TELEPORT
string.body: Kaisinel's Teleport Statue; This statue teleports users to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LC2]. It is located east of where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rhea] is standing.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DC1_DC2_TELEPORT
string.body: Marchutan's Teleport Statue;A statue that teleports users to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC2]. It is located near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Heimdall] at Vifrost Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_UnderPass_In
string.body: Silentera Westgate;An entrance to the Silentera Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q36015a
string.body: Wild Phanoe Ginseng;A rare Balaur ginseng that grows somewhere in the Phanoe Valley. It is known to be highly effective against many illnesses.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q36016a
string.body: Jeweled Tribute Box;A chest that the Dragonbound fill with treasure to honor Balaur. It is found somewhere in the Wretched Garden.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q36017a
string.body: Balaur Gold Storage Chest;A Balaur treasure chest hidden somewhere in Mitrakand, Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q46015a
string.body: Gelkmaros Silver Crystal;A precious crystal rumored to be in the Sunken Canyon. It glitters and gives off a silvery light.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q46016a
string.body: Golden Relic Chest;A relic chest hidden somewhere in Subterranea. It holds the relics of the ancient Reian Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_FOBJ_Q46017a
string.body: Balaur Treasure Chest;A Balaur treasure chest hidden somewhere in Hanarkand, Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_ODBox
string.body: Fine Odium;Odium refined by Kobolds in the Odium refinery of Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_ODGrass
string.body: Odella;Well-grown Odella cultivated in Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Mystery_OdStone_001_Li
string.body: Suspicious Odium Piece;A suspicious piece of Odium found in the Cantas Coast.

string.body: Suspicious Odium Pile;A suspicious pile of Odium found in the Cantas Coast.

string.body: Discarded Odium Pile;A suspicious pile of Odium found in Impetusium.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Root_from_Herb
string.body: Taloc's Root Herb;A wondrous herb said to grow near the roots of Taloc. It can neutralize the poison of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Neut_Egg
string.body: Wriggling Klaw Egg;A Klaw egg in Klawnickt's Cave. Its wriggling indicates that the hatching is near.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Toadstool
string.body: Rough Wind Mushroom;A mushroom that grows on the Inggison Gravepit cliff, feeding on the energy of wind.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Toadstool_002
string.body: Poisonous Wind Mushroom;A mushroom that grows on the Inggison Gravepit cliff, feeding on the energy of wind.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Toadstool_003
string.body: Red Wind Mushroom;A mushroom that grows on the Inggison Gravepit cliff, feeding on the energy of wind.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Gas_Bottle
string.body: Hardened Crater;A crater treated with chemicals to enable the sampling of sulfur.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Gas_Bottle_002
string.body: Soggy Crater;A crater treated with chemicals to enable the sampling of sulfur.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Gas_Bottle_003

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149A
string.body: Sulfur Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. It gushes out warm water high in sulfur content.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149B
string.body: Pool Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. There is a pool around it which teems with life.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11149C
string.body: Rock Geyser;A geyser in the Inggison Gravepit. Hot water gushes out from the gap between the rocks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDElim_Cocoon
string.body: Writhing Cocoon;A cocoon made by insects inside Taloc to capture intruders. The Reian tribesmen Abyla and Engeius are trapped in these cocoons.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Ore_cart
string.body: Aether Cart;A cart found inside Haramel. It is used to transport the produced Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Rough_Odum
string.body: Raw Odium;Pure raw Odum found in the Odium Strip Mine of Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Burning_Odella
string.body: Processed Odella;Processed Odella found inside Haramel. It seems to be contaminated with a special chemical.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_DriedSam
string.body: Well-Dried Ginseng;Dried ginseng found in Haramel. You can prepare delicious ginseng soup with five of these.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDNovice_Jar
string.body: Huge Cauldron;A huge cauldron found in Haramel. You can prepare some delicious ginseng soup here by adding five dried ginseng.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube
string.body: Severely Rusted Box;A box found at the top of the Haramel Tower, which is reached by using [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever]. It is said to contain valuable treasures of Hamerun.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance
string.body: Haramel Secret Entrance;A secret entrance in the Cantas Coast that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Instance_Entrance_Da
string.body: Haramel Secret Passage;A secret passage in Impetusium that leads to Haramel.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Supply_Box
string.body: Medicine Box;A box of medicines made by Lionel.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF1a_SensoryArea_Q18500
string.body: Suspicious Relic Site;A relic site located on the Cantas Coast in Verteron. It looks to be the source of the suspicious Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF1a_SensoryArea_Q28500
string.body: Abandoned Relic Site;A relic site located in Impetusium. It looks to be the source of the discarded Odium.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21072
string.body: Trace of Svasuth;It indicates that the bard Svasuth had been to the Gelkmaros Falls.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_shugobody_Q21136
string.body: Berokin;A Shulack inventor who used to live in Nunglark Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_Q21248
string.body: Balaur Limbcleaver;A weapon made by Drakan researchers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21249
string.body: Naduka Biolab Entrance;The entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_1
string.body: Limping Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_2
string.body: Concussed Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_LF4_patient_3
string.body: Backache Daeva;An injured Daeva in the Inggison Illusion Fortress. He was injured during a dredgion attack.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Elevator_Lever
string.body: Tower Lift;A device that takes you to a higher level within the Haramel Tower.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Li
string.body: Aratus;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Ab1_1011_TreasureGate_Da
string.body: Gwal;The keeper of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] located deep in the Divine Fortress in Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Laum
string.body: Laum;An armor craftsman who wanders around Elysea. He is very skilled but doesn't like to show off. Recently, he's been rumored to be staying in the Teminon Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Darkhum
string.body: Darkhum;An armor craftsman who wanders around in Asmodae. He is very skilled, but became bitter about everything when he failed to get any recognition. Recently he's been heard to be staying in the Primum Landing.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_ShugoExhausted_Q30263
string.body: Fallen Shugo;A Shugo who went to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] searching for treasure, but failed to return safely and ended up imprisoned in The Storm Cave.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_L8
string.body: Aurunerk;A greedy and devious Shugo in the Teminon Landing in Reshanta. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Shugo_AB1_D4
string.body: Ickulnerk;A Shugo in the Primum Landing in Reshanta, who is infamous for getting into all sorts of trouble due to his gullible nature. For some reason, he is in a state of constant fear.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Letia
string.body: Letia;A Daeva found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Silke
string.body: Silke;A Daeva found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. She loves pets and has several in her care.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Unos
string.body: Unos;A pet merchant found to the east of the Elyos Square in Sanctum. Pet eggs bought from Unos can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Katin
string.body: Katin;A pet merchant found in the Pandaemonium Plaza. Pet eggs bought from Katin can be hatched with the help of a Pet Minder and kept as pets.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076A
string.body: Illusion Fortress Windstream; A windstream found near the Inggison Illusion Fortress. It starts near [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Jienia].

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076B
string.body: Illusion & Phanoe Windstream; A windstream that extends from Illusion Fortress Windstream. It leads to the Phanoe Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q11076C
string.body: Phanoe & Taloc Windstream;A turbulent windstream that flows over the Phanoe Valley. It leads to Taloc's Hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_NPC_Vafuth
string.body: Faruth;An Archon investigating wind paths on the ridge between the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A6] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kotia
string.body: Kotia;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Kahlen
string.body: Kahlen;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in : [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Regan
string.body: Regan;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Bethell
string.body: Bethell;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Will
string.body: Willow;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Festa
string.body: Festa;A Daeva who came to help with the Daeva's Day festival. She is found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47000
string.body: Ward Orb;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Altgard Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47003
string.body: Ward Globe;A magical device for guarding the fortress. It is found near the Morheim Ice Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_Q47006
string.body: Field Amplifier;A device that reinforces the Aetheric Field. It is found near the Morheim Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114a
string.body: Kaidan Altar;An altar found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_K]. When a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Mentor] transform into Balaur at the altar, the Kaidan Head Priest appears.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37114b
string.body: Krall Tribute Chest;The treasure that the Kaidan Krall pay to the Balaur. If [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Li_35_45] speaks to the Kaidan Head Priest, you can receive the Tribute Chest containing the small fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105a
string.body: Ice Claw Altar;An altar built by the Ice Claw tribe to offer tribute to the Balaur. An Ice Claw Head Priest will approach if Asmodian Daevas disguise themselves as Drakan here.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q47105b
string.body: Mau Tribute Chest;Tribute from the Ice Claw tribe to the Balaur. It is said to hold valuable Mau treasures.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000
string.body: Tainted Inina;A toxic Inina in the Ellun River in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37003
string.body: Hunting Blind;A yurt in the Manduri Forest, covered in leaves and disguising [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_LehparAs_43_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2_FOBJ_Q37006
string.body: Screened Hideout;A leaf-covered yurt on the Lankusis Plateau that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2_DQ_DAssassin_43_An]s live in.

string.name: STR_DIC_DF4_SensoryArea_Q21080A
string.body: Gelkmaros Fortress Windstream;A windstream that leads from the Gelkmaros Fortress to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_A2]. It starts in an area in front of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_FOBJ_Q20020
string.body: Naduka Corpse;A Draconute corpse in the Antagor Battlefield. It was a casualty of the crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Minis
string.body: Minis;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA30] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Tali
string.body: Tali;He's in charge of the Harvest Revel, and is waiting near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_1] for someone to help get the festivities back on track.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Sonaran
string.body: Sonaran;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Mayer
string.body: Mayer;A young Daeva excited by Solorius. She is drinking in the atmosphere at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_LC1_XmasEvent_Santa
string.body: Portzebnerk;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] to organize Solorius. He is run off his feet with festival duties.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_LF4_3
string.body: Squeegenerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA21], [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA10], and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_DC1_XmasEvent_Rudolf
string.body: Rangidax;He visited [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] to organize Solorius. He looks a little tired from all his efforts.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Shugo_Peddler_Df4_01
string.body: Zubinerk;A Shugo who is taking part in Solorius as a volunteer. Unusually for a shugo, he refuses to get paid, and keeps running between [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_26], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_19], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1] to hide.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Lotus
string.body: Thourak;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Metrano
string.body: Metrano;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. They say he has Charm Cards of great value for any Daeva who speaks to him.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Harmonan
string.body: Tirrian;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Druike
string.body: Druike;One of the Fayrefolk who is visiting [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. She has a game that may improve the fortunes of those who are unsatisfied with their Charm Cards.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_event_Namor

string.name: STR_DIC_N_NPC_Bharakha
string.body: Maduka's Spirit;Formerly a Drakan retainer of Raksha, Maduka betrayed his lord. Unable to escape Raksang before the Seal was set, he was changed into a Mau and killed by Raksha loyalists. His ghost haunts Raksang in a rage.

string.body: Riome;A Jotun Researcher in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_09]. His position as assistant to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Acheron] is made more difficult by his boss' poor hearing.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Laso
string.body: Laso;He runs the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17] in Kamar. He is a good-natured man, though some accuse him of watering down his drinks.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_leyni
string.body: Leyni;A Bartender at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. She mixes a cocktail with Raydam herb that is rumored to be Kahrun's favorite drink.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_yohar
string.body: Yohar;A souse usually found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. Depending on who you ask, he was once a pirate, a Pagati racer, or Sarpan's boldest spelunker.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_miyerin
string.body: Miyerin;A waitress at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_OP_17]. She is tired of cleaning up after [%dic:STR_DIC_N_yohar].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Miss_drakan
string.body: The Dell Witch;Nobody is sure why this Drakan lingers in a cave in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A2]. Those in Drakan form can use the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_S4] to find her residence.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4B_FOBJ_LavaRock1
string.body: Pyroclast;Explosive ignious rocks around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4B_FOBJ_T3_Wagon
string.body: Abandoned Wagon;An abandoned, decrepit cart near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_CrystalBox
string.body: Antique Chest;Chests of old artifacts that can be uncovered around the Siel's Temple Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_CrystalYun
string.body: Frozen Reian Tribe;The spirits of ancient Reians, sealed inside crystalline outcroppings around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2]. The crystals can be weakened with an Aether Marble.

string.body: Astoos' Journal;A journal kept by Astoos the Adept.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41575A
string.body: Weathered Mamut Bones;The bones of a long-dead Mamut inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S4]. Legend says that they're haunted. Use a Projection Crystal to find out.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_OBJ_OldCube
string.body: Ancient Cube;A very old cube that belongs to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo6]. It was lost somewhere in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA07].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Brownie_Caldron

string.body: Ruaka;An Ordnance Quartermaster at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_OP].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41580A
string.body: Orph's Body;It lies where Orph fell in the Avad Mine. You can send the body back into the Aether using a Combustion Crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41593A
string.body: Aether Shield Generator;An important defensive tool for the Siege Troop Garrison. Use the most powerful Aether Crystal possible to maximize its effectiveness.

string.body: Dragonbound Weapons Chest;Chest strewn around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3] that contain Dragonbound weapons.
